items.sentence: I want to write my girlfriend a love letter in French.
I wanted to show Tom how to do what needed to be done.
I was about to leave for work when the telephone rang.
Why don\'t you give me your number and I\'ll call you?
I think, I\'d understand if you didn\'t want to do it.
It\'s going to take years for us to finish doing this.
Who\'ll take care of your dog while you\'re in Boston?
Do you usually turn on the TV as soon as you get home?
I think that Tom and I overdid it a little last night.
Tom and Mary live in a very nice house on Park Street.
